errors.occupiedRentalRequired: Occupied properties must have a valid rental amount

errors.fileSizeTooLarge: File size too large for processing.

errors.updateValidationFailed: Update validation failed. Please correct the errors and try again.
errors.occupiedPropertiesMustHaveRental: Occupied properties must have a rental amount
errors.singleUnitCannotBePartiallyOccupied: Single-unit properties cannot be partially occupied

errors.unableToAddUnit: Unable to add unit to property.
errors.propertyNotFound: Unable to add unit to property, property not found.

auth.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
auth.firstNameMaxLength: First name must be at most 25 characters
auth.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
auth.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must be at most 25 characters
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.locationMaxLength: Location(city) must be at most 35 characters

auth.companyProfileRequired: Company profile is required for business accounts
auth.tokenExpiredOrInvalid: Token is invalid or has expired
auth.passwordResetTokenInvalid: Password reset token is invalid or has expired
auth.passwordMinLengthDetailed: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
auth.passwordMaxLength: Password must be no longer than 15 characters.

property.totalAreaPositive: Total area must be a positive number
property.lotSizePositive: Lot size must be a positive number
property.bedroomsNonNegative: Bedrooms must be a non-negative integer

property.garageSpacesNonNegative: Garage spaces must be a non-negative integer
property.maxOccupantsMinOne: Maximum occupants must be at least 1

property.taxAmountNonNegative: Tax amount must be a non-negative number
property.rentalAmountNonNegative: Rental amount must be a non-negative number
property.managementFeesNonNegative: Management fees must be a non-negative number

errors.fileTypeNotSupported: File type not supported. Allowed types: {{allowedTypes}}
errors.invalidFileTypeForField: For field "{{fieldname}}", only these file types are allowed: {{fileTypes}}

errors.userRoleNotPermitted: User role not permitted for this action.

accountUpdate.message: This email is to inform you that, your account was recently updated at {{updatedAt}}. If you feel this update wasn't carried out by you please contact customer support.

forgotPassword.subject: Reset Your Password
forgotPassword.message: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to set a new password for your Property Solutions account.
forgotPassword.alternativeText: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link in your browser:
forgotPassword.expiryText: This link will expire in 1 hour. If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email.

registration.subject: Activate Your Account
registration.message: Welcome to Property Solutions! To complete your account setup, please click the button below to activate your account.
registration.alternativeText: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link in your browser:
registration.expiryText: This link will expire in 2 hours. If you didn't create an account, please ignore this email.

resetPassword.message: Your password has successfully been updated.for your account.
resetPassword.warningText: If you didn't initiate this equest please contact customer care urgently.
